attributes.additional_details:
Following Iain Duncan Smith's proposed Pre-Paid Benefits Card, I would like to suggest a similar system for MP's expenses.

As "We're all in this together", and keen to prevent spending on "non-essential" goods, such as duck houses, jacuzzis, and £39 breakfasts, this would seem the perfect way to regain some public trust, and allay any fears that this is little more than a demonising, compassionless, policy, part of an ongoing ideology of setting the poor against the even poorer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament and not for Government.
